conclusion: The total distance from the top plate to the bottom plate is d + l.
The electric field in the region above the metal plate is unaffected by the metal.
The electric field there should indeed be E = V / d.
The electric force on it is balancing some other force, probably gravity.
The electric field configuration after the metal plate is removed needs reconsideration.
The power supply maintains a constant voltage, so it will adjust the charge on the plates to keep V constant.
